pkgmetadata.longdescription: Load, Segment and Classify Zooplankton Images // This tool provides functions to load, segment and classify zooplankton images. The image processing algorithms and the machine learning classifiers in this package are (will be, since these have not been added yet) direct ports of an early 'python' implementation that can be found at https://github.com/arickGrootveld/ZooID. The model weights and datasets (also not added yet) that are a part of this package can also be found at Arick Grootveld, Eva R. Kozak, Carmen Franco-Gordo (2023) doi:10.5281/zenodo.7979996.
